evidence_in_dialogue: [[Mr._Reed]] my wife is still in there !
[[Brass]] officer clay entered the store unaware of a robbery that was in progress
[[Robbins]] officer clay was killed by a single close-range shotgun blast to the back of the head
[[Todd_Hallickey]] i test-drove this old honda accord this guy was trying to unload
[[Brass]] before the robbery went down , somebody at the store was very eager to talk to our suspects
[[Warrick]] i got this off the jacket from your apartment
[[Nick]] he clocked in for work that night
